cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on May 19, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 3283, To Repeal the Joint Resolution Entitled “A Joint Resolution to Promote Peace and Stability in the Middle East”

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 85 (Monday, May 17, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MEIJER:
H.R. 3283.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 11 of the United States
Constitution.
[Page H2421]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: To repeal the joint resolution entitled A joint resolution to promote peace and stability in the Middle East.
